title: Scandalmakers
description: A poorly-narrated series featuring re-enactments of real life scandals.
quote: You’ve been accused of producing a television show based on real life events for which you’ve done none of the due dilligence of securing the rights thereto.
altHero: Tobias Funke as George Bluth hiding out in a dark crawl space with a lantern
alt1: George Bluth escaping the hospital by ladder
alt2: George Bluth looking up into the sunlight peeking into his crawl space
alt3: Carl Weathers arm and arm with a woman friend
